titles.title: Migratory Birds of the Americas Conservation Enhancements Act of 2022
Migratory Birds of the Americas Conservation Enhancements Act of 2022
To amend the Neotropical Migratory Bird Conservation Act to make improvements to that Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Migratory Birds of the Americas Conservation Enhancements Act of 2022
This bill reauthorizes through FY2027 and revises the Neotropical Migratory Bird Conservation Act, which provides financial assistance for projects to promote the conservation of neotropical migratory birds.
